programme.title: AMI This Week - From The Vault
programme.desc: Grant Hardy speaks with the artist behind the Insufficient Art Project, an e-book of interviews and digital portraits in which British Columbians with disabilities share their experiences surviving on and accessing sub-poverty level assistance rates.

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc: (S10EP29) Grant Hardy learns about a collaboration between the CNIB, the Government of Canada and Moneris to create an accessible payment terminal for consumers who are blind.

programme.title: The Other Ordinary
programme.desc: The Other Ordinary spotlights eight Canadians, and their director, who are the only professional, travelling theatre group made up of people of all abilities.

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc:
(3) U.S. 1995. Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two mobster best friends and a trophy wife over a gambling empire.

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP28) On parle semaine québécoise de la déficience intellectuelle. Aussi, on vous présente une nouvelle émission sur les ondes d'AMI-télé, sur les innovations technologiques.
Année : 13

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
Brampton Mayor Patrick Brown and Oshawa Mayor Dan Carter (who was homeless for 14 years) discuss solutions to the growing homelessness crisis in their cities and across Canada.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Pre-Christmas Juanita Willems is flat out, collecting, wrapping and distributing presents for foster children, even though Juanita is blind.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
As their Outward Bound adventure continues, a group of people living with physical disabilities tackle their fear of heights, and a challenging waka journey.

programme.title: Postcards From ...
programme.desc:
Join Laura Bain as she highlights her hometown, Halifax, touring one the most beautiful libraries in the world, learning the history of Africville, and interviewing award-winning singer/songwriter Joel Plaskett.
Année : 2011

programme.title: The Invincible James Lee
programme.desc:
James Lee is a husband, father, avid athlete, and is about to become a double amputee. Follow James on his journey, from early doctor's appointments to the surgery room and eventual recovery.
Année : 2011

programme.title: The Achieveables
programme.desc:
A group of adventurers with disabilities spend three challenging days on the Kootenay River, known for its wild rapids, moody weather and stunning scenery. The Achievables is a story or tenacity, community, pain and triumph in the face of obstacles.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Best of Kelly and Ramya
programme.desc:

programme.title: Son of a Critch
programme.desc:

Année : 2022

programme.title: Mr.D
programme.desc:

Année : 2011
